http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.value: Robert Rechsteiner, plus connu sous son nom de ring Rick Steiner, est un catcheur professionnel américain.

Robert Rechsteiner, besser bekannt als Rick Steiner, ist ein US-amerikanischer Wrestler. Rick ist sehr bekannt für Auftritte bei National Wrestling Alliance, World Championship Wrestling und der World Wrestling Federation. Er trat als Einzelwrestler und als Hälfte des Tag-Teams „Steiner Brothers“ mit seinem jüngeren Bruder Scott auf.

Robert Rechsteiner, mejor conocido por su nombre artístico Rick Steiner, es un luchador profesional estadounidense. Steiner es mejor conocido por sus labores en la National Wrestling Alliance, World Championship Wrestling, World Wrestling Federation y Total Nonstop Action Wrestling, donde luchó de forma individual o en pareja con su hermano menor Scott, con quien formó The Steiner Brothers.

リック・スタイナー（Rick Steiner、1961年3月9日 - ）は、アメリカ合衆国のプロレスラー。本名はロバート・レックスタイナー（Robert Rechsteiner）。ミシガン州ベイシティ出身。WCW、WWFなどで活躍した。 レスリング選手出身であることをキャラクターに活かし、スタジアムジャンパーとショルダータイツをコスチュームに、イヤーガードを付けたまま試合を行う。また、相手を投げる際にクラッチしやすいように指にテーピングをしていることが多い。

Assieme a suo fratello Scott ha dato vita al tag team degli Steiner Brothers, uno dei più famosi nella storia del wrestling. Attualmente impegnato nel circuito indipendente, in passato ha lottato in molte delle federazioni più importanti del mondo, come la World Wrestling Federation (WWF), la World Championship Wrestling (WCW), la Extreme Championship Wrestling (ECW) e la Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA). Nella WWF ha vinto per due volte il World Tag Team Championship assieme a Scott.

Robert Rechsteiner (born March 9, 1961) is an American professional wrestler, better known under his ring name Rick Steiner. Steiner is best known for his tenure with World Championship Wrestling, where he was an eight time World Tag Team Champion. There was also a period of time when he held both the tag team titles himself, having won them at Halloween Havoc 1998.

Robert Rechsteiner, beter bekend als Rick Steiner, is een Amerikaans professioneel worstelaar die actief was in de National Wrestling Alliance (NWA), World Championship Wrestling (WCW), World Wrestling Federation (WWF) en Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA). Robert en zijn jongere broer Scott (Scott Steiner) wonnen als tag team, The Steiner Brothers, vele titels.
릭 스타이너는 미국의 프로 레슬링 선수이다. 본명은 로버트 리치스타이너이다. 前 아마추어 레슬링, WCW, WWE, TNA 출신으로 현재는 휴식을 취하고 있다. 동생은 마찬가지로 프로 레슬링 선수인 스캇 스타이너이다.

Robert Rechsteiner, mais conhecido pelo seu ring name Rick Steiner, é um lutador de wrestling profissional estadunidense. Steiner é melhor conhecido pelas suas aparições na National Wrestling Alliance, World Championship Wrestling, Total Nonstop Action Wrestling e World Wrestling Federation. Steiner competia em lutas simples, como em lutas de tag team. Formava dupla com Scott Steiner, atualmente empregado pela TNA, e eram conhecidos como "Steiner Brothers".

http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract.value: Robert Rechsteiner (born March 9, 1961) is an American professional wrestler, better known under his ring name Rick Steiner. Steiner is best known for his tenure with World Championship Wrestling, where he was an eight time World Tag Team Champion. There was also a period of time when he held both the tag team titles himself, having won them at Halloween Havoc 1998. In addition to tag team success, he was also a one time United States Heavyweight Champion and a three time World Television Champion. Besides WCW, Steiner also found success in the World Wrestling Federation, where he and Scott won the World Tag Team Championship twice.

Er trat als Einzelwrestler und als Hälfte des Tag-Teams „Steiner Brothers“ mit seinem jüngeren Bruder Scott auf.

Steiner es mejor conocido por sus labores en la National Wrestling Alliance, World Championship Wrestling, World Wrestling Federation y Total Nonstop Action Wrestling, donde luchó de forma individual o en pareja con su hermano menor Scott, con quien formó The Steiner Brothers.

リック・スタイナー（Rick Steiner、1961年3月9日 - ）は、アメリカ合衆国のプロレスラー。本名はロバート・レックスタイナー（Robert Rechsteiner）。ミシガン州ベイシティ出身。WCW、WWFなどで活躍した。 レスリング選手出身であることをキャラクターに活かし、スタジアムジャンパーとショルダータイツをコスチュームに、イヤーガードを付けたまま試合を行う。また、相手を投げる際にクラッチしやすいように指にテーピングをしていることが多い。

Assieme a suo fratello Scott ha dato vita al tag team degli Steiner Brothers, uno dei più famosi nella storia del wrestling. Attualmente impegnato nel circuito indipendente, in passato ha lottato in molte delle federazioni più importanti del mondo, come la World Wrestling Federation (WWF), la World Championship Wrestling (WCW), la Extreme Championship Wrestling (ECW) e la Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA). Nella WWF ha vinto per due volte il World Tag Team Championship assieme a Scott. Assieme al fratello detiene l'NWA Mid-Atlantic Tag Team Championship dal 9 dicembre 2006.

Robert Rechsteiner, beter bekend als Rick Steiner, is een Amerikaans professioneel worstelaar die actief was in de National Wrestling Alliance (NWA), World Championship Wrestling (WCW), World Wrestling Federation (WWF) en Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA). Robert en zijn jongere broer Scott (Scott Steiner) wonnen als tag team, The Steiner Brothers, vele titels.

Robert Rechsteiner, mais conhecido pelo seu ring name Rick Steiner, é um lutador de wrestling profissional estadunidense. Steiner é melhor conhecido pelas suas aparições na National Wrestling Alliance, World Championship Wrestling, Total Nonstop Action Wrestling e World Wrestling Federation. Steiner competia em lutas simples, como em lutas de tag team. Formava dupla com Scott Steiner, atualmente empregado pela TNA, e eram conhecidos como "Steiner Brothers". Segundo a revista Pro Wrestling Illustrated, a dupla foi a 2ª melhor da história, somente atrás de Road Warriors.
